items.title: Description
items.description: Maqlouba means upside down in Arabic. It is quite easy to work with.  Actually, quite an easy dish to make for a lot of people, I might have spent around and hour maybe 90 minutes on it.

items.title: On Palestine
items.description: This book is a critique of the horrendous way Israel has treated the Palestinians. It delves into all the classical arguments on the situations and dispels them. Their main argument is that Palestinians have as much of a right to their land as the Israelis.
